item.title: How to deploy to Github
item.description: Hosting your blog in Github is free, even with your own domain. And we made it easy too. Here’s how you do it.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Hugo has a bunch of built in shortcodes that make it super easy to embed content. Here are some examples.
